item.title: MockServer 简介
MockServer 介绍
item.description: MockServer Easy mocking of any system you integrate with via HTTP or HTTPS What is MockServer For any system you integrate with via HTTP or HTTPS MockServer can be used as: a mock configured to return specific responses for different requests a proxy recording and optionally modifying requests and responses both a proxy for some requests and a mock for other requests at the same time When MockServer receives a request it matches the request against active expectations that have been configured, if no matches are found it proxies the request if appropriate otherwise a 404 is returned.
